moduleDescription: This course will introduce a kinaesthetic approach to script analysis. Through a series of systematic physical movements and exercises, students will first learn to be connected to the essential instrument of an actor – the body. They then be guided to physically examine and experience performative concepts and elements of movement, activity, action, reaction, motivation, and impulse etc. This will be followed by exploring and investigating the physical range and variety of intention, action and reaction, through a series of exercises and workshops, which will then be applied on a selected text. This module will cumulate towards a performance.
